attributes.action: TAX PETROL PRICES WITH POST CODES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To reduce overtaxing petrol in petrol stations nationally, this petition proposes reduced petrol taxes (based on petrol station post code).

Due to limited public transport in rural areas, no alternative is truly evailable.

Higher petrol taxes in cities is justified by alternative bus, rail, cycle routes that are not available in rural communities day and night.
